title: Clinical significance of a new diagnosis of atrial fibrillation in patients with vascular disease
details: AP Benz, M Alings, J Bosch, A Avezum, DL Bhatt… - Heart Rhythm, 2025
abstract: Abstract Background The Cardiovascular Outcomes for People Using Anticoagulation Strategies (COMPASS) trial enrolled patients with vascular disease, but excluded patients requiring oral anticoagulation. Objective To explore the clinical …
